text.text:
I recently stayed at Zostel Viman Nagar, Pune, and it was truly one of the best experiences of my life. The place was clean, calm, and full of positive, feel-good vibes that made every day special.

The staff was incredible—super friendly, helpful, and genuinely caring. They made sure everyone felt welcome and comfortable, no matter where you came from.

The food was great—fresh, flavorful, and satisfying. Whether it was a quick bite or a relaxed meal, everything hit the spot.

One of my favorite memories was the game night! It was so much fun and a great way to connect with fellow travelers. I even learned how to play poker for the first time, and it turned out to be an unforgettable night filled with laughter and bonding.

Also, shoutout to Jugni, the hostel’s resident dog—she’s not only the cutest, but also super smart and full of love. Her presence added a unique charm to the stay.

If you’re looking for a place that’s more than just a bed—a space full of warmth, community, great food, fun vibes, and amazing people—Zostel Viman Nagar is the place to be. I’m already looking forward to my next visit!

text.text:
I recently stayed at this mid-budget hotel and was pleasantly surprised by the overall experience. From check-in to check-out, the staff were incredibly welcoming, professional, and attentive to detail. The room was clean, well-maintained, and came with all the essential amenities – comfortable bed, fast Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and a well-stocked bathroom.

Location-wise, it’s conveniently situated close to major attractions and public transport, making it easy to explore the area. I also appreciated the quiet ambiance, which made for a restful stay.

Overall, I highly recommend this hotel to travelers looking for a reliable and comfortable stay without breaking the bank. Would definitely book again!

text.text: We were visiting a friend who was staying at Lemon Tree. The staff was very attentive and welcoming. We had lunch. The Thai Curry was perfect. The ambience, decor, colours, patterns were all very classy and exquisite. We enjoyed long hours of lazy lounging but the staff was very polite and patient with us. There was something thought provoking, soothing, pleasant to the eyes in every corner we glanced at. We enjoyed our visit very much.

text.text: Stayed over the weekend for a self-reset. It was a very good experience. The check-in process was seamless and everything went smoothly. The breakfast buffet was yummmm and the staff was very attentive. I chose a corner seat and i was hidden away pretty much, but they found me and kept checking in and got me whatever I needed promptly. I really enjoyed that. Dinner buffet was also nice. The veg options were more than the non veg options but it was all good. There could be some more salad varieties but I loved it regardless. The room service was timely as well. I got a basil pesto spaghetti which was so rich that I couldn't finish it in one go. And the brownies were just heavenly. 10/10 recommended.

If you are looking for a hotel with great connectivity, Lemon Tree Viman Nagar can be a great choice.

I booked this hotel for my Mum and Dad who are senior citizens and they just loved the room and the hotel.
The Deluxe double bedroom was very big and clean.Staff was very helpful till the very Especially when it came to my father wanting his sports channel the staff ensured he got to watch his football match.Thata the plus point of having the couch infornt of the tv.
Only one request if only the outside area of the hotel would keep up to the standard of the hotel as in Maintenance it would be lovely🙂rest assured they loved everything especially the morning breakfast (park of the package which u have to book) which they savoured every flavour.
They have Swiggy and zomatoe and many restaurants in the vicinity.
Also a major plus piloint in the Pune international airport approx 10 min away give or take.
Thank you for your kind hospitality and keep up the good you'll do every day which sometimes guest don't appreciate.
When in Pune hopefully will definitely visit again.

text.text:
Absolutely disgraceful experience. You confirmed the booking at ₹1347 plus taxes, and then shamelessly hiked it to ₹2144. That’s not just misleading—it’s outright cheating. If there’s a level below “worst,” you’ve achieved it.
- The linen was filthy beyond belief—looked like it hadn’t been changed in weeks.
- No dental kits, no shampoo, no conditioner. Basic hygiene standards? Nonexistent.
- Not even a facility for tea or coffee, let alone proper food. What kind of hospitality is this?
This place is a textbook example of how to ruin a guest’s stay. Pathetic service, zero accountability, and a complete lack of integrity.

Overall a descent experience.

text.text:
So, this wasn't my 1st stay at any hotel affiliated with FAB, even I'm staying in Fab Hotels since it's inception.
But this was the most ugliest experience of all, I can recall my experience in the below points:-

1. Starting from the location of the hotel, I would really like to not recommend this hotel to any one, either it be couples, families or groups, because the location is way worse than you can ever imagine, you have to go through the slums, and if you're pretty rich with some big car like swift etc, you can't even reach the location with your car, you've to park it somewhere outside, which is not even safe.

2.check in process- So, the hotel FabExpress DDPK Ajay Inn has recently started some 3 months ago, as informed by the front desk manager, and he wasn't looking happy with his job there too 😂😂, which I can understand by his Management of the business. He took around 60- 70mins just for the check in and lead us to the room. Because he was unable to keep a count on his work force also, which is also really hilarious.
3. Hotel is 3months old, so with the new infrastructure, they have no clue of how to run it, and let me assure you, the room size which you saw in the enticing and lavishing pics are not really real, all that is a dogma.

4. Staff behaviour:- It was really hard to see any courtesy and mannerism in the staff, for which Fab chain is popular. Employees and staffs are not at well mannered, punctual or groomed.
I stayed at this hotel for 4days, and they never even bothered to clean the facilities provided.

5. Strictly , not recommended for the couples and families, because they don't even have kitchen facility so again and again you have to buy food from outside, which you can't eat in your room too, according to their ugly policy.

6. According to their advertisement, they provide you the power backup for 24hours, believe me, it's all fake.

7. As I've already mentioned that, this isn't my first stay at any fab, so with the standards and quality kept in mind, which i received from others, I would really appreciate if you do not go for this hotel, as you can even get far better than this, in Viman Nagar.

That's it guyz. Thank you. Cheers.

text.text:
I recently stayed at Parc Estique Hotel, Viman Nagar, from June 29 to July 1, 2025, in Room No. 525, and I would like to share my feedback.

Firstly, the positives:

The reception staff was extremely humble and supportive, making the check-in and overall experience very pleasant.

The restaurant service was commendable, with delicious food and courteous staff.

The room ambiance was excellent – it was well-scented, had a great view, and was kept tidy.

Room service was prompt, and the staff were polite and professional.

It was also appreciated that the room was stocked with a sufficient number of water bottles.

Areas for improvement:

There was no handwash provided in the bathroom, which is a basic hygiene requirement.

Shampoo and body wash supplies were insufficient for the duration of the stay.

A safety concern: where the wooden and tile flooring meet, a nail was protruding from the floor. Unfortunately, I injured myself twice due to this and had to take a tetanus injection as a precaution.

I hope these points are taken in the right spirit to improve the overall guest experience. Despite the mentioned issues, I appreciate the hospitality and look forward to better arrangements on my next visit.

Treebo Blossom enjoys a prime location in Viman Nagar, making it a convenient choice for both business and leisure travelers. The area is well-connected and peaceful, adding to the overall comfort of the stay.

Cons:
•	The linens in the room could have been cleaner.

Overall, Treebo Blossom is decent for a short stay, but there’s scope for improvement in cleanliness and dining experience.

text.text:
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ | Exceptional Hospitality at The Orchid Hotel

The Orchid Hotel truly exceeded all expectations — a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and outstanding service. From the moment we arrived, the staff made us feel welcome with their warm hospitality and professional demeanor.

The rooms were impeccably clean, spacious, and well-appointed with everything needed for a comfortable stay. Every detail, from the bedding to the amenities, reflected the hotel’s high standards.

What stood out most was the exceptional service — the staff went above and beyond to ensure every request was handled promptly and with a smile. Whether it was front desk assistance, room service, or dining staff, their attention to detail and genuine care made our stay truly memorable.

The food was also a delight — fresh, flavorful, and served in a beautiful setting. Whether dining at the restaurant or enjoying breakfast, everything was top-notch.

Highly recommended for anyone looking for a relaxing and luxurious stay. The Orchid Hotel delivers the best in class, and I will definitely be returning!

Overall, a nice stay with great hospitality.

I wouldn’t miss the chance to thank the hotel manager for helping me out of an unpleasant situation. When I first entered my room, there was a strong, unpleasant odor. I reported it to the reception, and while they tried to fix it with a room spray, it didn’t help much. Later, I figured out the smell was coming from the carpet. Upon raising the issue again, they quickly shifted me to another room with tiled flooring. That room was much better, and I could enjoy the rest of my stay comfortably.

Also, I must mention, the food was absolutely awesome, especially the vegetarian options. No doubt, the food was a highlight of the stay!

text.text: Recently stayed here for a business trip. While they call it serviced apartments, I don't see how different it is from a regular hotel. The best part of this hotel is the space you get. A decent sized bedroom, a small but cozy living room and a tiny kitchen near the washroom. Plus you also get a spacious balcony attached to the bedroom. However, you cannot open the curtains (at least from the side where I stayed) because you will be directly facing a residential building. Same goes with the balcony. Also, they serve the breakfast at the Magnus Square hotel, which is about 20 metres away from Calypso Suites. The elevator is old-styled and needs efforts to close and open. Price wise, it is okay. Staff is professional. But they won't tell you the wifi details until you ask for the same. Maintenance could have been a lot better. Bathroom is clean but could be better. There is centralised water heater. Each bathroom has a separate unit. But it works well.

text.text:
This hotel is the retirement project of a very kind and warm-hearted uncle. After retiring, he purchased this property and personally manages it, having transformed a residential building into a cozy, welcoming hotel. I absolutely loved my stay here.

Although officially rated as a 2-star hotel, I would happily rate it 5 stars for the experience. The place is extremely clean, well-maintained, and everything about it reflects care, love, and true dedication to guests. The uncle who manages it is one of the warmest, most welcoming, and genuinely kind people I’ve ever met. His cheerful nature makes you feel at home the moment you arrive.

What makes this place even more special is how well his values are reflected in the staff. Every member of the team serves you with the same warmth and sincerity, clearly carrying forward the high standards and passion of the owner. You can feel that this is not just a business, but a heartfelt project built out of love.

Highly recommended for anyone looking for a peaceful, homely, and memorable stay.

I have celebrated and organized multiple events at HHI Hotel, and each one has been an absolute success. Most recently, I hosted my sister’s baby shower there, and once again, the experience was outstanding.

Biplab managed the entire event with exceptional professionalism and precision, ensuring everything ran seamlessly. Avinash was a constant support throughout – humble, approachable, and always willing to help with a smile.All the support team were exceptionally professional.

The ambience was perfect – elegant, warm, and inviting – creating a wonderful atmosphere for the celebration. The food was excellent, with a great variety and taste that all our guests thoroughly enjoyed.

What I truly appreciate is their ability to manage timing and coordination flawlessly, making sure every element of the event flows without any stress for the hosts.

HHI Hotel has consistently delivered top-quality service, and I would highly recommend it for any special occasion or celebration.

text.text:
I recently stayed at your hotel for 7 days. While I truly appreciated the warm hospitality and courteous service from your staff, I would like to share a few areas of improvement for your consideration:
•	The hotel room, and especially the bathroom, felt quite cramped. The bathroom size and layout were very uncomfortable, giving the feeling of a railway washroom, which was quite unexpected from a hotel of your brand.
•	The breakfast menu was repetitive every day — mostly the same items like sambhar, idli, and poha. I was expecting more variety and better quality as per the standards your brand usually represents.

That said, I would like to sincerely thank your staff for their friendly behavior and prompt service throughout our stay. Their positive attitude truly made our experience more comfortable.

Looking forward to seeing some improvements, and I hope to have an even better stay next time.

text.text:
A Backpacker's Haven: The Wanderlust Hostel

Accommodation:
The hostel boasts a variety of cozy dormitories. Beds are comfortable, and linens are clean, ensuring a restful night's sleep after a day of exploration.

Facilities:
The communal spaces are where The Wanderlust Hostel truly shines. The lively common area buzzes with activity as guests swap stories, plan excursions, or simply unwind with a book from the well-stocked library. The kitchen is fully equipped, perfect for whipping up a quick meal or sharing a culinary adventure with newfound friends. Additionally, the hostel offers laundry facilities, lockers for valuables, and free Wi-Fi throughout the premises. Best for working.

Location:
Situated within walking distance of Viman nagar, The Wanderlust Hostel provides easy access to the city's main attractions, vibrant nightlife, and diverse dining options. Whether you're exploring historic sites, sampling local cuisine, or soaking in the natural beauty of the surrounding area, everything is within reach.

Staff:
The hostel's dedicated staff go above and beyond to ensure guests have a memorable stay. Friendly and knowledgeable, they're always on hand to offer insider tips, organize tours, or simply share a laugh over a cup of coffee.

In summary, The Wanderlust Hostel offers a quintessential backpacker experience that strikes the perfect balance between affordability, comfort, and camaraderie. Whether you're a solo traveler looking to make new friends or a group seeking adventure together, this hostel is the ideal base for your explorations. With its charming ambiance, excellent facilities, and unbeatable location, it's no wonder guests find themselves returning time and time again which I witnessed. All the best #Zostel 😊

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Lemon Tree Hotel Vimannagar, and I must say it was a truly delightful experience. From the moment I walked through the doors, the hotel's warm and inviting atmosphere captivated me. The exceptional service and attention to detail exceeded my expectations in every way possible.

The staff at Lemon Tree Hotel Vimannagar truly went above and beyond to ensure my comfort and satisfaction throughout my stay. Their friendly and welcoming demeanor made me feel right at home. They were always ready to assist with any queries or requests, displaying an unmatched level of professionalism.

The room I stayed in was spacious, clean, and beautifully designed. It had all the amenities one could ask for, including a comfortable bed, a well-stocked minibar, and a modern bathroom. The attention to detail was evident in the meticulous cleanliness and thoughtfully arranged furnishings.

What impressed me the most was the hotel's commitment to providing an exceptional guest experience. They offered me a free late check-out option, allowing me to relax and enjoy my stay without feeling rushed. Furthermore, the complimentary drop-off service to the airport was an unexpected and generous gesture that made my departure hassle-free.

The dining options at Lemon Tree Hotel Vimannagar were fantastic. The breakfast buffet showcased a wide variety of delicious dishes, catering to different tastes and dietary preferences. The restaurant staff was attentive, ensuring that every guest was taken care of with a smile.

The hotel's location in Vimannagar was ideal for both business and leisure travelers. It provided easy access to the airport and was in close proximity to several popular attractions and shopping centers. Additionally, the surrounding neighborhood felt safe and vibrant, with numerous dining and entertainment options within walking distance.

Overall, my stay at Lemon Tree Hotel Vimannagar was nothing short of exceptional. The staff's dedication to providing impeccable service, the comfortable and well-appointed rooms, and the thoughtful amenities created a memorable experience for me. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the area and look forward to returning on my future trips.

Exceptional Hospitality, Prime Location & Great Value

Location-wise this place is a total win. Centrally situated in Vimaan Nagar all the major spots are just a short ride away and getting around didn’t cost much either. Super convenient.
Overall I’m genuinely pleased with the stay and would absolutely recommend this place to anyone planning to visit Vimaan Nagar. Great vibes, great people, and serious value for money.

text.text:
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ | Exceptional Hospitality at The Orchid Hotel

The Orchid Hotel truly exceeded all expectations — a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and outstanding service. From the moment we arrived, the staff made us feel welcome with their warm hospitality and professional demeanor.

The rooms were impeccably clean, spacious, and well-appointed with everything needed for a comfortable stay. Every detail, from the bedding to the amenities, reflected the hotel’s high standards.

What stood out most was the exceptional service — the staff went above and beyond to ensure every request was handled promptly and with a smile. Whether it was front desk assistance, room service, or dining staff, their attention to detail and genuine care made our stay truly memorable.

The food was also a delight — fresh, flavorful, and served in a beautiful setting. Whether dining at the restaurant or enjoying breakfast, everything was top-notch.

Highly recommended for anyone looking for a relaxing and luxurious stay. The Orchid Hotel delivers the best in class, and I will definitely be returning!
